sentences.en: A late booking may involve you in extra cost.
sentences.cn: 预订晚了的话你可能要额外多花钱。

sentences.en: All booking must be made by post.
sentences.cn: 所有的预订工作均可来信办理.

sentences.en: Always insist upon seeing your room before booking in.
sentences.cn: 在住进旅馆之前一定要坚持先看一下你的房间.

sentences.en: bookings on cruise ships
sentences.cn: 预订游船船位

sentences.en: Did you succeed in booking the tickets?
sentences.cn: 你订到票了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Early booking is advisable.
sentences.cn: 早订票是明智的。

sentences.en: For details of cheap excursion tickets, apply at the booking office.
sentences.cn: 关于廉价旅游票的详情, 可向售票处询问.

sentences.en: I made a booking for two double rooms.
sentences.cn: 我预订了两个双人房间。

sentences.en: I suggest you tell him there was a mistake over his late booking.
sentences.cn: 我建议你告诉他，他应该及早预订。

sentences.en: I’m calling to confirm my booking (=  say definitely that I want to travel etc  ) .
sentences.cn: 我打电话是想确认一下我的预订。

sentences.en: If you cancel your booking , there will be a small charge.
sentences.cn: 如果你取消预订，就要付一小额费用。

sentences.en: Once you have chosen a kennel, don't forget to make a booking for your pet.
sentences.cn: 一旦你选好了养狗场，别忘了为你的宠物预订。

sentences.en: Places on the course are limited and advance booking is essential.
sentences.cn: 课程名额有限，必须预订。

sentences.en: She came to the station and went to the booking office.
sentences.cn: 她来到车站,去了订票处.

sentences.en: The booking is only provisional.
sentences.cn: 这只是暂定的预订。

sentences.en: The booking office sells tickets 3 days in advance.
sentences.cn: 售票处预售3天的票.

sentences.en: The move is designed to boost sales during the peak booking months of January and February.
sentences.cn: 这一举措旨在增加1月和2月预订高峰期的销售量。

sentences.en: The three men stayed at two hotels in Nottingham, booking in at one the day before the crime.
sentences.cn: 这3个人住在诺丁汉的两家旅馆里，而且都是在案发的前一天登记入住。

sentences.en: Those booking a block of seats get them at reduced rates.
sentences.cn: 团体订座可享受折扣价。

sentences.en: Tickets are on sale from the booking office.
sentences.cn: 售票处正在售票.

words.tran_cn: 书籍；卷；帐簿；名册；工作簿

phrases.tran_cn: （演员等的）经纪人；（机票，戏票等的）人

trans.tran_cn: 预约，预订，挂号，演出契约，订货
trans.tran_en: an arrangement to travel by train, use a hotel room etc at a particular time in the future

trans.tran_cn: 预订(book的现在分词)，预约，预定
